Description of Records Requested.name: dot-form1-field1
Description of Records Requested.error_message: Error, Description of Records Requested is required. Please enter a description.

Location.name: dot-form1-field3
Location.help_text: Street address; street with cross street(s) (e.g. 350 5th Avenue; or 5th Avenue and 1st Avenue; or 5th Avenue between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue)

custom_request_forms.form_description:
Please note this Request Type should be used for those who are physically at the FDNY Public Records Unit or requesting online. Please complete all the required fields below.

This Request Type will allow you to request the following records:

  • Fire Incident Report
  • Fuel Tank Special Report
  • Violation Special Report
  • Copy of a Violation

custom_request_forms.form_description: Please note this Request Type should be used for those requesting 911 Call Report not Ambulance Reports. Instructions for obtaining Ambulance Call Reports can be found under Agency Instructions above. Please complete all the required fields below.

custom_request_forms.form_description: Please note this Request Type is for Fire Incident Reports only, unrelated to the Fire Marshal Investigation Reports. Instructions for obtaining Fire Marshal Investigation Reports can be found under Agency Instructions above. Please complete all the required fields below.

Description of Incident.help_text: Please provide a short description of the incident. If Transportation was selected above, please make sure to provide the Type, Make, and Plate of the vehicle.
